verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: hearty jambalaya] i love anything with cajun spices so i came up with this slow - cooker jambalaya that just as good as that served in restaurants if you ca n’t find andouille sausage hot links smoked sausage or chorizo will also work i like to serve it with warm cornbread and garnished with sliced green onions —jennifer fulk moreno valley california
